body_html: I also came across this issue. I am using MPI_Allreduce to do distributed training of my model. I noticed that my workers were not converging because of this issue. Parallel_iterations == 1 seems to have solved it.
body_text: I also came across this issue. I am using MPI_Allreduce to do distributed training of my model. I noticed that my workers were not converging because of this issue. Parallel_iterations == 1 seems to have solved it.
body: I also came across this issue. I am using MPI_Allreduce to do distributed training of my model. I noticed that my workers were not converging because of this issue. Parallel_iterations == 1 seems to have solved it.
